questions.question: This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates exploring a dangerous, beast-filled island and confronting a mad scientist. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
This arc showcases the history of Sanji and the power struggle within the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This ability, seen in the Wano arc, allows the user to transform into an ancient dragon. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Kaido's Dragon

questions.question: This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This ability, used by a former Warlord of the Sea, allows the manipulation of shadows. What is...?
This lesser-known member of the Revolutionary Army is recognized for his ability to create powerful winds and for being the second-in-command to Monkey D. Dragon. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a musician known for his long nose and ability to create powerful sound-based attacks. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for their former bounty of 340 million berries and their power of the Mera Mera no Mi. Who is...?
